title: Write Manifests Task Configuration
description: Defines configuration options for the task which modifies manifests

deployCdnPath.title: Path to CDN
deployCdnPath.description: Path to where assets should be staged for deployment to CDN during a production build

cdnUrlPrefix.title: CDN URL Prefix
cdnUrlPrefix.description: A prefix to prepend to all assets' URLs. For example, if this value is 'contoso', a resulting CDN path for an asset called 'baz.js' will be 'contoso/baz.js'

cdnBasePath.title: CDN Base Path
cdnBasePath.description: This value will populate the 'internalModuleBaseUrls' CDN manifest property.

debugBasePath.title: Debug Base Path
debugBasePath.description: The debug base path, which is the value that will populate the 'internalModuleBaseUrls' manifest property for debug manifests.

debugLocale.title: Debug Locale
debugLocale.description: If specified, only use this locale in the debug manifest.

cumulativeManifestOptions.title: Cumulative Manifest Options
cumulativeManifestOptions.description: Options for the cumulative manifest files to be dropped in the dist folder. If this field is null, cumulative files will not be produced.

ignoreOutputManifestIds.title: Ignore Output Manifest IDs
ignoreOutputManifestIds.description: IDs of manifests to exclude from the manifest map file.

baseUrl.title: Base URL
baseUrl.description: The base path for debug manifests. Expected to match the result of the 'debugBasePath' function passed to the WriteManifestsTask task.

shouldWrapProductionManifestForManifestS.title: Should Wrap Production Manifest For Manifest Server
shouldWrapProductionManifestForManifestS.description: If true, wrap the manifest in the Manifest Server format. This should be true for all Microsoft internal builds. Defaults to false.
